comments.body: We can merge this PR without solving this issue, but I notice that the two modules being updated here don't use the same term in the RETURN documentation - one uses `example` and the other one uses `sample`. We should use one or the other consistently.
Thanks for your review! It's my fault that I didn't check it out. I should change 'example'  to 'sample', which has been changed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +120,124 @@                    type: str
                    required: True
                    sample: Microsoft.Sql
                locations:
                    description:
